answers.answer: Ouch,@ big head.  I will keep you in my prayers that all is well when you take the test.  Keep us posted
Same here...Praying for you that you don't have GD.  But sending labor dust your way! =]

question: Hi ladies, i had my 35 week and 4 day check yesterday, i had a scan which all was cool he weighs 6lb 7oz already. They did say that my amonic fluid has increased so they think i might have gestational diabetes. I have to go to the hospital on wed for some tests. Lets hope when i go in hospital on tuesday to have my stitch out that i go into labor and dont have to worry about having GD. Looks like im going to have a little fattie for a son. They also said his head size is at the top end of the scale ( AHH big head). Kelly x
title: 35 weeks check yesterday.
